curriculums.title: Frontend Development
curriculums.description: Learn the essentials of frontend development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
learningObjectives: Understand the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Build responsive and accessible web pages

modules.title: HTML Basics
modules.description: Learn the fundamental structure of HTML documents.

modules.title: CSS Fundamentals
modules.description: Master styling web pages with CSS.

modules.title: JavaScript Essentials
modules.description: Learn the basics of JavaScript programming.

curriculums.title: Backend Development
curriculums.description: Understand server-side programming and database integration.

modules.title: Node.js Basics
modules.description: Introduction to server-side programming with Node.js.

modules.title: Database Management
modules.description: Learn to work with relational and non-relational databases.

modules.title: Building RESTful APIs
modules.description: Develop and test RESTful APIs using best practices.

curriculums.title: Mobile App Development
curriculums.description: Learn to create mobile applications using cross-platform frameworks.

modules.title: Introduction to Flutter
modules.description: Learn the basics of Flutter framework for cross-platform development.

modules.title: Building Mobile UI
modules.description: Create responsive and interactive mobile interfaces.

curriculums.title: Data Science Fundamentals
curriculums.description: An introduction to data science, focusing on data analysis and visualization.
learningObjectives: Understand the basics of data analysis
Learn statistical methods for data interpretation

modules.title: Introduction to Data Science
modules.description: Explore the fundamentals of data science and its applications.

modules.title: Data Visualization
modules.description: Learn to create visual representations of data.

curriculums.title: Cybersecurity Basics
curriculums.description: Understand the fundamentals of cybersecurity and how to protect systems.
learningObjectives: Apply best practices for securing applications

modules.title: Cybersecurity Overview
modules.description: Learn the essentials of cybersecurity and its importance.

modules.title: Encryption and Protocols
modules.description: Understand the role of encryption in securing systems.
